title: "These new tools could make AI vision systems less biased"
excerpt: "Thong and Xiang’s team developed a tool— shared exclusively with MIT Technology Review—that expands the skin-tone scale into two dimensions, measuring both skin color (from light to dark) and skin hue (from red to yellow). Sony is making the tool freely available online ."
